name: psilocybin
content:

a substance produced by some types of fungus that when eaten can cause hallucinations (= make you see things that are not real): Mycelium contains psilocybin which turns blue when it oxidizes. The patients take a small dose of synthetic psilocybin, equivalent to two or three illicit mushrooms.
More examplesFewer examplesPsilocybin has been shown to invoke powerful spiritual experiences during the four to six hours it affects the brain.The federal government places psilocybin in its most restricted class of drugs .A trial began exploring whether psilocybin could relieve the symptoms of cluster headaches.
